divs: Sighting DetailsWE WERE GOING TO SLEEP IN A TENT IN THE BACKYARD OF OUR HOUSE.IT WAS AROUND MY BIRTHDAY.I HAD A COUPLE OF FRIENDS STAYING WITH ME.IT WAS LATE.IT WAS DARK.I DONT REMRMBER A WHOLE LOT ABOUT IT,BUT I REMEMBER ME AND ONE FREIND LOOKING UP AND SEEING THE OBJECT IN THE SKY.I DONT REMEMBER HEARING ANY NOISE FROM IT,IT SEEMED TO HOVER,IT WAS HARD TO TELL HOW FAR AWAY IT WAS,BUT I DONT THINK IT WAS MORE THAN A COUPLE OF HUNDRED YARDS AWAY.I DONT REMEMBER IT FLYING OFF.IJUST REMEMBER LOOKING AT IT IN THE SKY.IDONT THINK ME AND MY FREIND TALKED A WHOLE LOT ABOUT IT,BUT WHEN WE WERE IN HIGH SCHOOL I MENTIONED IT TO HIM AT A PARTY AND HE CONFIRMED THAT HE REMEMBRED SEEING IT TO .AFTER HIGH SCHOOL I DIDNT SEE MUCH OF THE FREIND.HE WENT TO COLLEGE UPSTATE AND EVENTUALLY BECAME A DOCTOR AND NOW RESIDES IN SAN ANTONIO.ITS BEEN A LONG TIME SINCE I TALKED TO HIM BUT IKNOW WHAT I SAW AND IM SURE HE REMEMBERS SEEING IT ALSO.IM NOT SAYING WHAT WE SEEN WAS A SHIP WITH ALIEN BEINGS FLYING IN IT.IM JUST SAYING I KNOW WHAT I SAW WAS NOT CONVENTIONAL OR FROM THE MILITARY. EVEN WITH THE TECHNOLOGICAL ADVANCES MAN HAS MADE SINCE THEN,WHAT WE SAW WAS NOT CONVENTIONAL THEN OR NOW OR EVEN IN THE NEAR FUTURE.I REALLY JUST WANT,WHOEVER TAKES THESE KIND OF THINGS SERIOUS TO KNOW WHAT WAS OR STILL IS OUT THERE,BECAUSE I THINK EVERYONE ON THIS PLANET NEEDS TO KNOW THE TRUTH.
Summary: SPHERE IN THE SKY THAT LOOKED LIKE A ROUND RUBIKS CUBE WITH PANELS THAT CHANGED COLORS VERY FAST
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around June 18th 1984
